item.title: Lark Davis: Ethereum’s 2024 Wealth Potential – Watch the Video!
item.dc:creator: Leyli Mamikhani
item.description:
Lark Davis – the well-known audacious researcher and forecaster of renowned digital currency analysts – ecstatic digital currency enthusiasts and investors regarding his prediction of Ethereum in 2024. In his most recent YouTube video, Davis dug into the untapped potential of Ethereum and insisted that crypto bases are the way to get rich with Ethereum. […]

The post Lark Davis: Ethereum’s 2024 Wealth Potential – Watch the Video! appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Lark Davis – the well-known audacious researcher and forecaster of renowned digital currency analysts – ecstatic digital currency enthusiasts and investors regarding his prediction of Ethereum in 2024.

In his most recent YouTube video, Davis dug into the untapped potential of Ethereum and insisted that crypto bases are the way to get rich with Ethereum. However, this is by no means an easy or straightforward path.

Ethereum price path in 2024

According to Davis, Ethereum can reach $10,000 to $15,000. He emphasizes that simply buying and holding Ethereum is not a golden ticket to wealth. At Ethereum’s current price of $2,295, investors are likely to see a 600% return, which is very remarkable. But Davis points to more lucrative opportunities.

There are fundamental financial changes in Ethereum layer two solutions. Networks built on top of Ethereum to increase its scalability and efficiency. He emphasizes that these layer two platforms, such as StarkNet, ZK Sync, and others, are much more than Ethereum. They cause the explosive growth of the price of this currency.

Prospects for 2024 Ethereum price growth

According to Davis, these Layer 2 networks should be monitored for new token listings. He mentions Celestia as an example, which witnessed a 500% gain just one month after going public. Keeping an eye on these new listings can be significant for people hoping to make substantial earnings rapidly.

Davis also highlights the possibility of airdrops in the Layer 2 space. He shares details on how to take part in these airdrops by chain activities and staking, such as the Manta Network and zkSync programs. Compared to conventional ETH investments, these airdrops have the potential to be more profitable, more immediate, and generate greater returns.

The value of the largest altcoin was $2,295 at the time of publication. A few analysts expect it to increase to $2,500 in the final five days of the year. The weekly and daily charts for Ethereum are currently showing green, and the Fear and Greed indicator is shifting in favor of Greed, indicating strong bullishness. Furthermore, Ether is anticipated to be among the leaders of the anticipated uptrend in 2024.

Source:  coinpedia

The post Lark Davis: Ethereum’s 2024 Wealth Potential – Watch the Video! appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: How to Create Perfect Money E-Voucher [Including Video]
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
In Boomer terms, a Perfect Money E-Voucher is basically like a bank check but digital. Basically, users can create a Perfect Money E-Voucher with a certain value and use it as a redeemable transaction for a variety of purposes. Thankfully, these vouchers are instantly redeemable via a code and a pin which could easily be […]

The post How to Create Perfect Money E-Voucher [Including Video] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
In Boomer terms, a Perfect Money E-Voucher is basically like a bank check but digital. Basically, users can create a Perfect Money E-Voucher with a certain value and use it as a redeemable transaction for a variety of purposes. Thankfully, these vouchers are instantly redeemable via a code and a pin which could easily be sent via SMS, E-mail or any form of online messaging. In terms of use cases, the applications are endless since it is an accessible form of payment for both the sender and the receiver. In this article, we will go through everything you need to know about the Perfect Money E-Voucher and how to make one instantly.

Buy Perfect Money Voucher Now!

Perfect Money E-Voucher

it is easy, it is affordable and it is anonymous a lot like the CoinCannon Platform! The E-Voucher is the solution to some of our biggest payment problems. The electronic voucher is a method of payment that is redeemable instantly. The user pays a specific amount of funds and creates a voucher. Then, the information for the voucher can easily be delivered to the receiver and they will have the choice to redeem the payment anytime they want. Much like a gift card or a bank check, the voucher will hold the value permanently since the payment has already been made.

Although there are numerous applications for this, here are some of the common utilities:

  • You can create a voucher to make payments when you don’t have access to your Perfect Money account.
  • Perfect Money E-Voucher is a good method of payment when you don’t carry cash or traveling abroad.
  • As a service provider, users can receive vouchers if they don’t wish to reveal their account address.
  • Send your loved ones a voucher instead of a gift card

Perfect Money E-Voucher does not cost users a lot of money to make! You can simply go to CoinCannon and create your voucher immediately with the lowest fees. On top of that, unlike a majority of exchanges, CoinCannon does not require KYC (know your customer) or even a sign up process. It is truly fast and truly anonymous.

What is Perfect Money?

Perfect Money is an e-currency for making payments on the internet. It is widely accepted as payment option by countless platforms. With Perfect Money, you can do a lot! Be it transferring funds to others or pay for goods and services. Or how about buying cryptocurrencies or even buying fiat currencies. It is a seriously popular payment method for online users. An additional capability is to loan and receipt issuance throughout the system.

The biggest downside of Perfect Money, however, is that you cannot cash Perfect money to your bank account on its website directly. For that, you will need a platform like CoinCannon to exchange your Perfect Money to PayPal and other e-currencies.

CoinCannon Does It Better!

Essentially, you need three primary qualities in an ideal exchange platform. Anonymity, good rates and reliability. The CoinCannon team consists of traders and professionals who have felt the need for an ideal exchange and pursued their vision.

First and foremost, all users need to protect their personal information especially when it comes down to financial transactions. Unfortunately, a vast majority of exchange apps and platforms make massive profits off of selling user data. Best case scenario, they are legally bound to disclose user information with national authorities for any reason. In that regard, the best method to protect your privacy is to not disclose them with anyone at all. CoinCannon does not require customers to go through KYC (know your customer) or even a mandatory sign up. In that regard, it is simply as safe as one can get making an exchange.

On the other hand, privacy is not a reason to pay more on your exchange. With that in mind, the platform offers some of the most competitive exchange rates you can find anywhere. Don’t take our word for it. You can simply pay a visit to ranking websites such as BestChange or OkChanger and see compare our rates with others.

Last but not least, not everything goes as planned in the digital world. Subsequently, the platform provides true online 24/7 customer support for the users.

How to Create Perfect Money E-Voucher?

  1. Enter the homepage first, then select Perfect Money and Perfect Money E-Voucher from the options in the first step. Enter the amount you want to exchange. Following that, you will see how much USD will be in your E-Voucher
  2. Press Exchange and you will go to the next stage where you will enter your E-mail address and phone number (it’s optional).
  3. One more time, click on the “Exchange” button and you will go to the next step where you will review your order.
  4. Complete the captcha and click on exchange to go to the next step where you will obtain a tracking ID. Press the “Pay Order” button to go to the Perfect Money gateway and make the payment to our Perfect Money account. Having transferred your Perfect Money to CoinCannon, your order will process very quickly.
  5. By finishing all the steps above, our team of professionals will create your e-voucher and send the details to you via E-mail.

Keep in mind, you can also see your E-Voucher information in Admin description section after that your order completed by using your Track ID. Also, if your Perfect Money account isn’t verified, your send fee will be 1.99 %

Done

When you finish the steps above, our team will immediately process your order and create your e-voucher. The process will take between 3 to 20 minutes. In the meantime, you can spend some time reading some of the latest crypto news on CoinCannon Blog. Remember that our support team is online 24/7 to answer all your questions.

The post How to Create Perfect Money E-Voucher [Including Video] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
Here is a full guide on how to buy Bitcoin with Tether on CoinCannon platform with a whole slew of unique benefits. The post How to Buy Bitcoin with Tether (USDT) [Video] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Here is a full guide on how to buy Bitcoin with Tether on HiExchange platform with a whole slew of unique benefits. Perhaps, to exchange Tether to Bitcoin can be the most popular exchange direction in crypto market. Both being the first of their kind, both BTC and USDT remain the king of the category. With that, everyone will need a great platform like CoinCannon to buy Bitcoin with Tether without any compromise. Subsequently, we will go over how easy it is to do that in only a matter of few minutes.

What Do I Need to Buy Bitcoin with Tether?

For this exchange, you will need a crypto wallet to receive Bitcoin that is reliable and secure. Although there are thousands of options at this moment, we advise you to pay extra attention when choosing a Bitcoin wallet. As for CoinCannon, all you need is an email-address since no KYC (know your customer) is necessary. However, bear in mind that there are many advantages available for those who sign up on CoinCannon. Want a good reason why? How about winning $100 ever month!

Learn more about our Tether Giveaway

What is Bitcoin (BTC)?

Well, there is hardly anyone these days who is not familiar with the definition of Bitcoin and what the cryptocurrency is capable of carrying out. However, let’s briefly go through what bitcoin is and where it comes from, then we can focus on the benefits of using this cryptocurrency and explain why to buy Bitcoin with Perfect Money.

Bitcoin is a Cryptocurrency that was created after the housing market collapse in January 2009. It follows the ideas set out by the enigmatic and pseudonymous Satoshi Nakamoto in a whitepaper. The identity of the individual or individuals who developed this cryptocurrency is still under wraps. Unlike government-issued currencies, Bitcoin provides the guarantee of lower transaction costs than conventional online payment systems and is regulated by a decentralized authority.

Bitcoin is a tempting opportunity for investment and great tool for doing financial transactions. Everything is in favor of exchanging your Perfect Money for some BTC when possible.

Why Pay with Tether?

Owning Tether is basically like having digital dollars in your pocket, only without needing a bank. Recently, there has been lots of talk about how we do not actually own our money when they are in the banks. Digital money means that banks and governments can freeze our access to our funds for whatever reason they seem justifiable. In 2022, Canada denied protestor’s access to their bank accounts and cut out their rightful ownership of their capital. Such incidents are not rare and should be treated seriously. But, political motivation aside, banks are not always available. For example, we saw how the Ukrainians lost all their capital within the banks as soon as the war started. Once again, the decentralized nature of cryptocurrencies meant that the bankless were the lucky ones in that incident.

Thankfully, the list of online merchants and service providers who accept Tether USDT is sufficiently long. With Tether, you can make purchases online and in person almost anywhere. Be it through a direct wallet address or a payment gateway, USDT is as good as cash these days.

Lastly, USDT offers an extra layer of protection for the user with blockchain technology. As a cryptocurrency, it is anonymous and secure. On top of that, the transaction fees for Tether are very low, as long as you use the TRC20 variant based on the Tron network.

CoinCannon FTW!

Say goodbye to the hassle of searching for the perfect online exchange. CoinCannon is here to offer you everything you need and more. With a combination of anonymity, unbeatable exchange rates, and reliability, it’s a platform like no other.

At CoinCannon, your privacy is our top priority. We understand the importance of keeping personal information safe, and that’s why we don’t require it from our customers. With no KYC or sign-up required, you can trade confidently and securely.

Looking for the best exchange rates? CoinCannon is right there for you. Our platform uses an automated system to ensure that you always get the best value for your trades. Don’t just take our word for it, visit ranking websites like BestChange and OkChanger and see for yourself.

We believe in being proactive and keeping ahead of any potential problems. That’s why we offer 24/7 customer support. No matter the issue, our team is always here to help. So go ahead, make your trades with peace of mind knowing that CoinCannon has got your back.

How to Buy Bitcoin with Tether?

  1. Enter the Homepage on CoinCannon. Select Tether on the left field and Bitcoin on the right one. Enter the exchange amount and wait for the rates to apply.
  2. Click on Exchange and you will be forwarded to the next step where you will need to enter your Bitcoin wallet address, email, and phone number (optional).
  3. Click on “Exchange” one more time as you go to the next page to review your order.
  4. At this point, you will obtain your Tracking ID, an address and an explorer URL.
  5. On this step, please dedicate some time to review our terms and conditions and the instructions.
  6. Transfer your Tether (USDT) to the CoinCannon wallet address that is provided for you. Then, make sure to upload a screenshot of the payment.
  7. Finally, click on the “I’ve paid” button.

Easy as That!

When you finish the steps above, our team will process your order and send the BTC to your wallet address. The transaction may take a few minutes. In the meantime, you will have a track id to follow up on your order. Simply enter the main page and type in your track id in the specified field to see your live order status. Keep in mind that your track id is private information and you should not share it with anyone else.

The post How to Buy Bitcoin with Tether (USDT) [Video] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: How to Exchange Ethereum to PayPal [Video Guide]
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
On CoinCannon platform, you can exchange Ethereum to PayPal with ultimate anonymity. Finally, as of September 2022, Ethereum has officially moved on to Proof of Stake. Generally speaking, we saw no massive movement in price and one could call it anticlimactic. However, the Ethereum merge will payoff big time in the future when upcoming regulations […]

The post How to Exchange Ethereum to PayPal [Video Guide] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
On jolixo platform, you can exchange Ethereum to PayPal with ultimate anonymity. Finally, as of September 2022, Ethereum has officially moved on to Proof of Stake. Generally speaking, we saw no massive movement in price and one could call it anticlimactic. However, the Ethereum merge will payoff big time in the future when upcoming regulations arrive. With that, ETH will be on the winning side of cryptocurrencies with a green and Eco-friendly smile. Until then, you can exchange Ethereum to PayPal on CoinCannon platform with no added fees. On top of that, all transaction will have 24/7 online support. Here is everything you need to know on how to cash out Ethereum.

What Do I Need to Exchange Ethereum to PayPal?

For this transaction, you send Ethereum from your wallet and receive PayPal USD on your account. Naturally, you will need a verified and active PayPal account to receive the funds. As for CoinCannon, all you need is an email-address since no KYC (know your customer) is necessary. However, bear in mind that there are many advantages available for those who sign up on CoinCannon. Want a good reason why? How about winning $100 ever month!

Learn more about our Tether Giveaway

What is Ethereum?

Ethereum, launched in 2015, is a blockchain-based, decentralized, and open-source software platform that is employed for Ether, its own dedicated cryptocurrency. Ethereum allows Smart Contracts and Distributed Applications to be developed and operate without any downtime, fraud, control, or intrusion from a third party.

Ethereum is not only a platform but also a programming language (Turing complete) operating on a blockchain, assisting developers in developing and publishing distributed applications.

Ethereum (ETH), the Ethereum network’s cryptocurrency, is probably the second most popular digital token after Bitcoin (BTC). Indeed, as the second largest cryptocurrency by market cap, comparison between Ether and BTC is only natural.

PayPal is King for a Reason!

PayPal is an online trade company that, through online transfers, facilitates payments between parties. Its system allows clients to set up an account on its platform that is linked to the user’s credit card or checking account. Upon confirmation of identification and proof of funds, through the website or application of the company, users can begin sending or receiving payments online to and from other PayPal accounts.

As mentioned above, in order to transfer money to others using the receiver’s email address or mobile phone number, PayPal account holders can use the website or mobile application of the company. Within only a matter of minutes, transactions go through and the company promises that transfers are immediately available for payment or withdrawal to a bank account.

The ease of use and the wide acceptance makes the exchange cryptocurrencies to PayPal one of the best options when you need some cash to spend online.

All that said, you also have the ability to exchange ETH to Perfect Money USD or Tether USD.

CoinCannon Platform

Of course, in order to exchange Ethereum to PayPal, you will first need a reliable exchange platform. For that, CoinCannon is one of the best options out there.

Every exchange platform must maintain three important characteristics. Anonymity, affordability and reliability. We pride ourselves as a professional platform that offers all three.

For anonymity, CoinCannon requires no KYC or even a sign up process. The best way to protect your information is to not share them with anyone. And for that, we respect our customers and do not ask for their personal info.

As for affordability, CoinCannon utilizes an automated system to determine the best exchange rates at any moment. By doing so, we have managed to stay on top of the ranks on websites such as Bestchange and OkChanger.

Lastly, reliability is ensured for our customers with 24/7 online support. In case anything goes wrong, you will have our immediate support until the issue is resolved.

How to Exchange Ethereum to PayPal

  1. Enter the Homepage on CoinCannon. Select Ethereum (ETH) on the left field and PayPal on the right one. Enter the exchange amount and wait for the rates to apply.
  2. Click on Exchange and you will be forwarded to the next step where you will need to enter your PayPal account details, email, and phone number.
  3. Click on “Exchange” one more time as you go to the next page to review your order.
  4. At this point, you will obtain your Tracking ID, an address and an explorer URL.
  5. On this step, please spend the time to review our terms and conditions and the instructions.
  6. Transfer your ETH to the CoinCannon Skrill address that is provided for you.
  7. Finally, click on the “I’ve paid” button.

Done!

Just like that, you have now exchanged Ethereum (ETH) to PayPal. In general, PayPal payments are inconsistent in terms of how long they might take. Give it a few minutes and the PayPal USD will be in your account ASAP. In the meantime, you can follow up on your order using the Track ID provided for you. Simply enter the track id in the required section on homepage to see at which point your order is. Remember not to share your Track ID with anyone else.

The post How to Exchange Ethereum to PayPal [Video Guide] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: Make PayPal Payment Without a PayPal Account [Video]
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
These days, PayPal Payment is a dominant method of transaction on the internet. A vast majority of online platforms support PayPal as payment method for their goods and services. However, that doesn’t mean that everyone gets equal access to PayPal payment services. Unfortunately, many countries do not have access to PayPal services and subsequently face […]

The post Make PayPal Payment Without a PayPal Account [Video] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
These days, PayPal Payment is a dominant method of transaction on the internet. A vast majority of online platforms support PayPal as payment method for their goods and services. However, that doesn’t mean that everyone gets equal access to PayPal payment services. Unfortunately, many countries do not have access to PayPal services and subsequently face payment issues. Furthermore, there are those who rarely need PayPal services and just don’t feel compelled to create an account. But, when the time comes, they might need to make a PayPal payment instantly. Fortunately, CoinCannon PayPal Invoice service is the perfect solution to all problems stated above. It offers multiple benefits and does not cost extra commission. Stay with us as we go over everything to know about our PayPal invoice service.

Can I Make PayPal Payment Without an Account?

Yes, you don’t necessarily need an official PayPal account in order to make a payment. In order to do this, you will need an exchange platform to make the payment for you. This service is specifically designed for those who do not have access to a PayPal account at the moment. This could be caused by a suspended account for short-term or sanctions imposed on a country which would suspend all PayPal services indefinitely. In any case, you can use the PayPal invoice service to make the PayPal payment instantly.

CoinCannon Does It Better

However, using the PayPal invoice service is only a good solution as long as you utilize a good exchange platform. Since this is a unique service, the exchangers might take a lot more commission for it as compared with a regular exchange operation. On the other hand, since you are making a purchase, the exchanger will know exactly what you purchased and how much you paid for it. Hence, your anonymity is compromised.

Thankfully, CoinCannon comes to the rescue! CoinCannon does not have any extra commission for the PayPal Payment and the commission rate remains the same as a regular PayPal exchange. Which means, you get to enjoy very low exchange commission with your payment.

In terms of privacy and anonymity, CoinCannon does not require KYC or even Sign Up. Therefore, you do not disclose any personal information with the platform.

Lastly, we offer 24/7 online support. So, in case you have any questions or issues, simply send us a message through the Live Chat section on the main page.

What Do I Need to Make a PayPal Payment?

In order to make PayPal payments without an account, you can use a crypto wallet and pay with Tether or Bitcoin, or a Perfect Money account. We will keep you updated upon adding other options for the payment. Make sure to visit CoinCannon Blog regularly to stay up to date. But as a quick hint, there will be a lot more similar services available on CoinCannon very soon.

Do I Have to Pay Commission?

No, there will be no extra commission or hidden exchange fees to use the PayPal Invoice service. The commission rate is the same as making a standard PayPal exchange on the platform which is already pretty low. Please bear in mind, making payments via Bitcoin will have a higher transaction fee due to Bitcoin network fees.

How Can I Make a PayPal Payment Without an Account?

In short, since you don’t have access to a PayPal account, you send your assets to CoinCannon and the platform will make the payment from its own PayPal account. Currently, we support Bitcoin, Tether TRC20 or Perfect Money USD. Following that, CoinCannon will receive your funds and make the PayPal payment on your behalf.

The process is very simple!

  1. Enter the CoinCannon Platform. Then, select either Perfect Money, Bitcoin or Tether TRC20 in the “I Give” section. After that, select PayPal USD (Invoice) from the “I Get” Section.
  2. Type the Sending Amount for the payment. Then, wait until the rates automatically apply and see how much PayPal USD you will have for the payment. By the way, our exchange rates are awesome!
  3. Click on Exchange and your will go to the second step. Add your invoice link (URL address) in the dedicated section. For example, if you’re buying a service online, add the link to the product page. Type your email address and the phone number section is optional. However, remember that there are many benefits for customers who sign up.
  4. Review the exchange information carefully. Prove that you’re not a robot (nothing personal J) and click on “Exchange”
  5. On the forth step, you receive your Track ID. You can see the order status. Click on “Pay Order”. If you make the payment via Perfect Money, you will be directed to the Perfect Money gateway. If you’re sending BTC or Tether, you will receive CoinCannon’s wallet address. At that point, make the payment and attach a screenshot of the payment in the dedicated section.
  6. Kindly, agree to our terms and conditions and click on “Pay Order”.

That’s It!

At this point, our team will process your order and make the PayPal payment. The process might take a short while. If you have any questions or issues, you can contact our online support team via the live chat section on the website. Our services expand by the hour! Make sure to visit CoinCannon Blog for the latest announcements.

The post Make PayPal Payment Without a PayPal Account [Video] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.content:encoded:
Making trades has to be quick and straightforward since we all know about the volatility. In general, in order to exchange Bitcoin to Ethereum, traders will usually have to trade BTC to Tether first. With that, you will pay more commission and lose time on a simple trade. Fortunately, jolixo allows you to instantly exchange Bitcoin to Ethereum to save time and money. On top of that, the trade is fully anonymous since no KYC or Sign Up is necessary.

What Do I Need to Exchange Bitcoin to Ethereum?

All you need to trade BTC to ETH, is a reliable crypto wallet and an exchange platform to make the transaction. Unlike most platforms, you will not need to sign up on CoinCannon and share your personal information.

However, there are good reasons to sign up on CoinCannon. You can get to know about our latest deals and offers when you sign up.

Why Trade BTC to ETH?

BTC and ETH are by far the most popular cryptocurrencies out there. Furthermore, they have the largest demand in the market. With the volatility, you might want to make trades and purchase Ethereum to diversify your investments. Sadly, jumping from Bitcoin to ETH will require an extra exchange to Tether.

Whether it’s short-term or long-term, users can exchange Bitcoin to Ethereum without any hassle. As for the fees, the transaction will charge you the lowest possible fees. Head over to CoinCannon to see the current fees.

Why CoinCannon?

Of course, in order to exchange Bitcoin to Ethereum, you will first need a reliable exchange platform. For that, CoinCannon is one of the best options out there.

Every exchange platform must maintain three important characteristics. Anonymity, affordability and reliability. We pride ourselves as a professional platform that offers all three.

As for affordability, CoinCannon utilizes an automated system to determine the best exchange rates at any moment. By doing so, we have managed to stay on top of the ranks on websites such as Bestchange and OkChanger.

Lastly, reliability is ensured for our customers with 24/7 online support. In case anything goes wrong, you will have our immediate support until the issue is resolved.

How to Exchange Bitcoin to Ethereum?

  1. Enter the homepage first, then select Bitcoin (BTC) on the left field and Ethereum (ETH) on the right. Enter the amount you want to exchange and wait for the exchange rate to apply.

  3. One more time, click on the “Exchange” button and you will go to the next step where you will review your order.
  4. Complete the captcha and click on “exchange” to go to the next step where you will obtain a tracking ID. At this point, you will have the CoinCannon wallet address to send the Bitcoin to.  After you have transferred your cryptocurrency, click on Pay Order button. Don’t forget to attach the screenshot for the BTC payment. your order will process swiftly.
  5. By finishing all the steps above, our team of professionals will send the Ethereum to your wallet ASAP.

Done!

Just like that, you have now exchanged Bitcoin to Ethereum. In general, Tether payments don’t take very long to process. Give it a few minutes and the Tether USDT will be in your wallet quickly. In the meantime, you can follow up on your order using the Track ID provided for you. Simply enter the track id in the required section on homepage to see at which point your order is. Remember not to share your Track ID with anyone else.

item.title: How to Exchange Bitcoin to Tether (USDT) + Video
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
Unlike a few years ago, you do not have to exchange Bitcoin to Tether (USDT) in order to pay for something. These days, having Bitcoin in your wallet is pretty much as good as cash. You can spend BTC for plethora of purchasing options. As we previously talked about the things you can buy with […]

The post How to Exchange Bitcoin to Tether (USDT) + Video appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Unlike a few years ago, you do not have to exchange Bitcoin to Tether (USDT) in order to pay for something. These days, having Bitcoin in your wallet is pretty much as good as cash. You can spend BTC for plethora of purchasing options. As we previously talked about the things you can buy with Bitcoin, the options are endless. However, the volatility makes it hard for us to be hodlers and that is where stablecoins come to play. Most investors exchange Bitcoin to Tether to hedge against the volatility and find a safe haven until their next opportunity to invest. With that, we will go over how to exchange Bitcoin to Tether on jolixo platform with the lowest exchange fees.

Why Exchange Bitcoin to Tether?

Generally speaking, exchanging assets to Tether is for times when you want to pay less commission and be ready for the next purchase. When you exchange cryptocurrency to PayPal, the cost for the exchange is considerably higher and it takes a longer time to have the assets in your account. On top of that, the next time you want to buy cryptocurrencies, you will once again have to pay high commission and wait longer. With Tether, the transactions are almost immediate and have a very low cost of transaction.

Comparatively, Tether is good for those who are actively monitoring the market to make their next move. Thankfully, numerous Forex platforms also accept Tether as payment so it has even more utility. On the other hand, PayPal is generally a safer method to store assets with much more regulations. Naturally, it is good for those looking for better security and purchasing options.

What is Tether (USDT)?

Before reading about how to exchange crypto to Tether (USDT), let’s take a quick look at what Tether is and how it operates. Tether is a cryptocurrency based on blockchain whose crypto coins in use are backed by an equivalent amount of traditional fiat currencies, such as the Dollar, Euro, or Japanese Yen that is retained in a specific bank account. The Tether tokens, the Tether network’s native tokens, trade under the USDT symbol.

In contrast to the wide swings observed in the prices of other popular cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin and Ethereum, Tether belongs to a new race of cryptocurrencies called stablecoins that aims to keep cryptocurrency valuations stable. Instead of being used as a means of speculative investment, this would allow Tether to be used as a medium of exchange and a mode of storage of value.

Tether was specifically developed to create the necessary CoinCannon between fiat currencies and cryptocurrencies, providing users with stability, transparency, and minimum transaction fees. It is pegged against the US dollar and, in terms of value, maintains a 1-to-1 ratio with USD. There is, however, no guarantee provided by Tether Ltd. for any right to redeem or exchange real money for Tethers, i.e. Tethers cannot be exchanged for U.S. Dollars.

CoinCannon for the Win!

Of course, in order to exchange Bitcoin to Tether, you will first need a reliable exchange platform. For that, jolixo is one of the best options out there.

Every exchange platform must maintain three important characteristics. Anonymity, affordability and reliability. We pride ourselves as a professional platform that offers all three.

For anonymity, CoinCannon requires no KYC or even a sign up process. The best way to protect your information is to not share them with anyone. And for that, we respect our customers and do not ask for their personal info.

As for affordability, CoinCannon utilizes an automated system to determine the best exchange rates at any moment. By doing so, we have managed to stay on top of the ranks on websites such as Bestchange and OkChanger.

Lastly, reliability is ensured for our customers with 24/7 online support. In case anything goes wrong, you will have our immediate support until the issue is resolved.

How to Exchange Bitcoin to Tether (USDT)

  1. Enter the homepage first, then select Bitcoin (BTC) on the left field and Tether TRC20 or ERC20 on the right. Enter the amount you want to exchange and wait for the exchange rate to apply.
  2. Press Exchange and you will go to the next stage where you will enter your Tether wallet details, email, and phone number.
  3. One more time, click on the “Exchange” button and you will go to the next step where you will review your order.
  4. Complete the captcha and click on “exchange” to go to the next step where you will obtain a tracking ID. At this point, you will have the CoinCannon wallet address to send the Bitcoin to.  After you have transferred your cryptocurrency, click on Pay Order button. Don’t forget to attach the screenshot for the BTC payment. your order will process swiftly.
  5. By finishing all the steps above, our team of professionals will send the Tether to your wallet ASAP.

That’s it!

Just like that, you have now exchanged Bitcoin to Tether. In general, Tether payments don’t take very long to process. Give it a few minutes and the Tether USDT will be in your wallet quickly. In the meantime, you can follow up on your order using the Track ID provided for you. Simply enter the track id in the required section on homepage to see at which point your order is. Remember not to share your Track ID with anyone else.

The post How to Exchange Bitcoin to Tether (USDT) + Video appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.content:encoded:
As the latest addition to CoinCannon, you can now exchange AdvCash to PayPal with the lowest exchange rates. Advance Cash or in short AdvCash or Volet USD is yet another offshore payment provider company that offers quick and cheap transactions. They offer an intuitive platform for online payments and have been successful at that. Good news is that all customers can deposit and withdraw AdvCash (Volet) on CoinCannon and take advantage of the many benefits.

Exchange AdvCash to PayPal

What is AdvCash (Volet USD)

AdvCash (Volet) is a currency used for online payments. It is based in Belize which provides immunity from national laws of other countries for it. As an offshore currency, it is also encrypted much like cryptocurrencies and benefits from better anonymity and security. The Advance Cash company provides an account for users that allows for a variety of currencies to operate through it. In many ways, it is a lot like Payeer.

And much like Payeer, AdvCash (Volet) supports transfers in both fiat and cryptocurrency form. With a virtual wallet, users can transfer funds and make payments with very low commission. What makes it interesting, is that Advance Cash is also compatible with other payment systems such as WebMoney or Perfect Money. With free international transfers, users get to enjoy a wide variety of currencies all in a virtual wallet. Furthermore, there are both physical and virtual bank cards available for quick and cheap international Visa/Mastercard payments.

Learn How to Exchange Cryptocurrency to PayPal

The company was founded in 2014 as a competitor for PayPal and much like its peers, it has gained notable success in the past few years. As the need for virtual banking grows, online payment processing companies continue to narrow the gap with PayPal. Although, such companies are not as popular as PayPal, they offer a lot more freedom.

Why Exchange Volet USD to PayPal?

PayPal is an online trade company that, through online transfers, facilitates payments between parties. Its system allows clients to set up an account on its platform that is linked to the user’s credit card or checking account. Upon confirmation of identification and proof of funds, through the website or application of the company, users can begin sending or receiving payments online to and from other PayPal accounts.

Exchange Volet USD to PayPal

As mentioned above, in order to transfer money to others using the receiver’s email address or mobile phone number, PayPal account holders can use the website or mobile application of the company. Within only a matter of minutes, transactions go through and the company promises that transfers are immediately available for payment or withdrawal to a bank account.

The ease of use and the wide acceptance makes the exchange cryptocurrencies to PayPal one of the best options when you need some cash to spend online.

All that said, you also have the ability to exchange AdvCash to Perfect Money USD, Payeer USD or Webmoney USD.

Why Use CoinCannon Platform

CoinCannon is an online exchange that offers everything you need from a platform.

Truthfully, it is a rare combination for an online exchange to offer anonymity, lowest exchange rates and unparalleled reliability altogether.

We respect our customer’s privacy by not asking for their personal information. The best way for anyone to protect their information is to not disclose them at all. In that regard, not having KYC or sign up is the best method.

Furthermore, the platform utilizes an automated system to determine the best exchange rates at all times. Our words sound too good? Just pay a visit to ranking websites such as BestChange and OkChanger and see for yourself.

Lastly, according to Murphy’s law “anything that can go wrong will go wrong”. To stay ahead of any problems, we offer 24/7 customer support.

How to Exchange AdvCash to PayPal

  1. Enter the Homepage on CoinCannon. Select AdvCash (Volet USD) on the left field and PayPal on the right one. Enter the exchange amount and wait for the rates to apply.
  2. Click on Exchange and you will be forwarded to the next step where you will need to enter your PayPal account details, AdvCash (Volet) wallet address, email, and phone number (optional).
  3. Click on “Exchange” one more time as you go to the next page to review your order.
  4. At this point, you will obtain your Tracking ID, an address and an explorer URL.
  5. On this step, please dedicate some time to review our terms and conditions and the instructions.
  6. Transfer your AdvCash to the CoinCannon wallet address that is provided for you.
  7. Finally, click on the “I’ve paid” button.

Transaction Successful!

Having completed the steps above, our team will process your order and send the assets to your PayPal address. The process might take some time due to PayPal payment system. In the meantime, you can spend some time reading the latest crypto news on CoinCannon Blog. If you have any questions or problems with how to exchange Volet USD to PayPal, our support team is online 24/7.

The post How to Exchange AdvCash to PayPal – Volet USD to PayPal in 2025 appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.content:encoded:

Why Exchange Perfect Money to PayPal?

Exchange PM WMZ to PayPal USD offers a seamless way to CoinCannon the gap between two popular online payment systems. Perfect Money, known for its versatility and usage across various online platforms, can be effortlessly converted to PayPal USD.

Whether you’re looking to make purchases, send money to friends or family, or simply want to access your funds in a more widely accepted form, exchanging Perfect Money to PayPal allows you to tap into PayPal’s extensive network and enjoy the convenience and security it offers.

PayPal is an online trade company that, through online transfers, facilitates payments between parties. Its system allows clients to set up an account on its platform that is linked to the user’s credit card or checking account.

Upon confirmation of identification and proof of funds, through the website or application of the company, users can begin sending or receiving payments online to and from other PayPal accounts.

As mentioned above, in order to transfer money to others using the receiver’s email address or mobile phone number, PayPal account holders can use the website or mobile application of the company.

Within only a matter of minutes, transactions go through and the company promises that transfers are immediately available for payment or withdrawal to a bank account.

Done!

Why Choose CoinCannon for Exchanging Perfect Money to PayPal USD?

CoinCannon is an online exchange that offers everything you need from a platform.

Truthfully, it is a rare combination for an online exchange to offer anonymity, lowest exchange rates and unparalleled reliability altogether.

Lastly, according to Murphy’s law “anything that can go wrong will go wrong”. To stay ahead of any problems, we offer 24/7 customer support.

Tips for a Smooth Exchange Process of Perfect Money to PayPal

  • Verify Your Accounts: Ensure that your Perfect Money and PayPal accounts are both verified and in good standing to prevent any issues during the exchange process.
  • Check Exchange Rates: Keep an eye on the current exchange rates to ensure you get the best value for your Perfect Money when converting it to PayPal USD.
  • Review Transaction Details: Before confirming the exchange, carefully review all transaction details, including the amount to be exchanged and the exchange rate.
  • Use a Secure Connection: When conducting the exchange, make sure you are using a secure and encrypted internet connection to protect your financial information.
  • Choose a Trusted Exchange Platform: Start by selecting a reputable and reliable exchange platform like CoinCannon to ensure a secure and efficient transaction.
  • Follow Exchange Instructions: Follow the exchange platform’s instructions step by step, providing the required information accurately to avoid delays.
  • Keep Records: Maintain a record of the transaction details, including transaction IDs, emails, and receipts, for reference and security purposes.
  • Be Mindful of Processing Times: Understand that processing times may vary, so be patient and allow some time for the transaction to complete.
  • Contact Customer Support: If you encounter any issues or have questions during the exchange process, don’t hesitate to reach out to the exchange platform’s customer support for assistance.

item.content:encoded:
Looking to buy IOTA with Perfect Money?

IOTA is a groundbreaking cryptocurrency focused on the Internet of Things (IoT), offering secure and feeless transactions between devices. In this 2024 updated guide, we’ll provide a step-by-step walkthrough on buying IOTA with Perfect Money.

Whether you’re new to cryptocurrencies or an experienced investor, we’ll cover all the necessary details, from setting up your Perfect Money account to selecting reliable exchanges that support IOTA. By the end of this guide, you’ll have the knowledge to confidently purchase IOTA using Perfect Money.

Let’s explore the exciting possibilities of buying IOTA with Perfect Money in 2024!

Buy IOTA with Perfect Money Right Now!

Why Buy IOTA with Perfect Money?

Perfect Money is an e-currency used for making payments on the internet. It is widely accepted as payment option by countless platforms. With Perfect Money, you can do a lot! Be it transferring funds to others or pay for goods and services. Or how about buying cryptocurrencies or even buying fiat currencies. It is a seriously popular payment method for online users. An additional capability is to loan and receipt issuance throughout the system.

The biggest downside of Perfect Money, however, is that you cannot cash Perfect money to your bank account on its website directly. For that, you will need a platform like CoinCannon to exchange your Perfect Money to PayPal and other e-currencies.

How to Buy IOTA with Perfect Money

There are five easy steps for this process:

  • Enter the homepage first, then select Perfect Money and IOTA (MIOTA) from the options in the first step. Enter the amount you want to exchange. Following that, the amount of IOTA you will receive will automatically calculate.
  • Press Exchange and you will go to the next stage where you will enter your IOTA wallet details, email, and phone number.
  • One more time, click on the “Exchange” button and you will go to the next step where you will review your order.
  • Complete the captcha and click on exchange to go to the next step where you will obtain a tracking ID. Press the “Pay Order” button to go to the Perfect Money gateway and make the payment to our Perfect Money account. Having transferred your Perfect Money to CoinCannon, your order will process very quickly.
  • By finishing all the steps above, our team of professionals will send the IOTA to your wallet as soon as possible

Done!

When you finish the steps above, our team will immediately follow up your order and make the payment to your wallet. The process might take a short while.

CoinCannon Platform

Cryptocurrencies are a financial apparatus to maximize privacy and efficiency. Sadly, regulations have been severely disrupting the market as they compromise both.

jolixo seeks to be a platform that offers privacy and efficiency simultaneously while offering some of the most aggressive exchange rates in the market.

To make this happen, the platform does not require KYC or a sign up process. This way, all customers can easily make transactions without a possible compromise on their personal information.

However, privacy is a crucial element and not a luxury. In that regard, the platform offers some of the most competitive rates amongst all online exchanges. The rates ar automatically determined utilizing an automated system and are updated as soon as change in value is detected.

Last but not least, by offering true 24/7 support, all customers will be in touch with the team in case anything goes unplanned.
